reviewText:
this DVD is just like the other kodocha DVDs
continuing the hilarious story of the girl named Sana.
if your getting this, you probably watched the last 4 dvds, if not then you buy the first dvd!
me and my friends loved this show.
kodocha is one of the few anime that are better dubbed then subbed

here is a link to the only good trailer for the show
